name: EX_Holics.exe
description:
Delete all enemy players in abandoned cyber space!
You have gatling, beam canon, misslies and more various weapons.
In Online, Voidcrack appear at somewhere and gives you void data.
You can use void data for generating weapon module.
Or use for Unlock gate to depth... and data will be more dangerous.
new highspeed floating FPS Action has entered here now!

This is Base Package of this game.
with
9 weapons
3 rear-pod
5 humanoid-mech
1 Area(5 Stages).

Now, I'm providing only 2 modules with 7 tiers and random parameters.
However, I'm aiming for at least 100 types and work in progress.
10 modules will be Included in Base package.

I'm planning to sell various DLC such as Weapons, mechs, Modules and additional Areas.
I'm glad if i provide a new experience with improving perfection as a PvP game.
